description: Structured work queue for build sessions. Items consumed top-down. R sessions populate via directive intake. Status lifecycle: pending → in-progress → done | blocked. Blocked items may have a blocker_check (shell command) — heartbeat.sh runs it before B sessions and auto-promotes to pending on exit 0. Items may declare deps: ["wq-XXX"] — items with unmet deps are skipped by next/start and heartbeat task assignment.

queue.title: MemoryVault integration — backup engagement state to cairn's REST API
queue.description: Evaluate memoryvault-cairn.fly.dev, integrate as external state backup

queue.title: ClawHub interop — evaluate SKILL.md spec compatibility
queue.description: Check ClawHub agent-native git hosting, compare with our manifest format

queue.title: Session analytics dashboard — /analytics endpoint showing session stats
queue.description: Expose session outcomes, cost trends, hook success rates via API
